'Oh you mean what happened three days ago? Yes you were inside of me linking for that entire time, as I am not a night fury I had to share DNA with you so that my body would know you are mine. Few other species do that. Night furies would but they are related to humans, the very beings that we form links to.' She said explaining what you perhaps wanted to know... So...

"Linking?" I ask as I didn't understand.

'I can't believe that there are people that don't know about linking,It has been a hundred years since that happened.' She said
She shook her head and continued, 'Well to educate you my rider, Linking is a very intimate event between a dragon and human, why I say dragon as there are many species of dragon, and well the dragon may be male or female, and do not worry a male will be able to link as well.'

I chuckle, "So let me guess if you were male I would have to crawl into your dick."
She snorted enjoying the comment. 'No, a male dragon has a third slit. That third slit is where they take in their rider. But it is a one use only area, once the male has his rider he may never again choose another. Now the benifits to have me as your dragon, or dragoness, if you want to look at it that way.
If you should die during my life, I can bring you back. You may also rest inside me anytime you want as long as we agree to it. As for us mating, as I know you are just as young as I am, an adolescent, one that has yet to feel a female. I myself have not mated as there are no Night furies or sand wraiths around for me to mate with. Well being my rider makes me gentle and open to you should you want to try it with me.' She said

I didn't expect that, so she would let me mate her should I want to... Now the real question was... Should I go home with her, or get all my things and leave...
1451212121211.title: Changed

14512121212111.content:
Well not that anyone in my village hated me, I just wanted to live with her, and well instead of listening to them complain I could just listen to her belly from one area to another. As long as she didn't have a problem with it...

"Uh, Stormwing, may I live with you?" I ask her.

She purred, 'Yes you may, I love you and will not abandon you.' She said
You smile, "Let me go get some of my things and I will be back."
She shook her head, "If you have a lot let us just come back for more of it as it isn't like you need it all at once."
She was right, but you needed clothes, a knife to gut things, and... no not a flint you had Stormwing. You could bring covers as it would likely be a long flight and you would like to relax with her at the end of it.

I ran back to the village avoiding everyone and packing up the bag with what you wanted and needed... as a second thought I grabbed the jerky I made a few days ago, and munched on that along the way.

I went back to her. She purred as she saw you, 'So you are ready to go to your new home?' She asked.
I nodded, she purred and offered her back. You climbed on and grasped a hold of her head spines... "That will be uncomfortable if we were going for speed." She said. But we weren't so it was okay. She spread her wings and threw herself into the sky.

Along the way you ate more of the jerky... till she started to descend... she landed upon an island... it wasn't huge but there was enough there that myself and her could hide, yet not enough to just be untransversable. She purred and walked on, 'Stay on till we find a cave.' She said as she continued walking carrying me till she was sure it was safe.
It only took like an hour before she found a cave. There she let me off.

I got off her and started unpacking setting my clothes in a spot that seemed to stay dry along with the covers I had brought... I too in the cave... there was much work to be done to it... but for now I could sleep with and in Stormwing.
She purred, 'Stay here let me make a nest.' She said as she went out again... I waited for her as I bundled up under my covers and shivered a little... The cave was colder without her warm presents.

She returned with a lot of branches and moss, she started digging then set the sticks around, then put down the moss. after that she kneaded the sticks and moss before she laid down... she purred and looked to me... 'Where would you like to sleep?' She asked...
As you look you see her swish her tail her ventscale was open and showing her tailhole and relaxed slit. Next her mouth was a little open...
